greeting: You can’t escape me, can you?
threat: Your mind is a house of glass, and I hold the first stone.
Every step you take is another misstep I’ve planned.
insight: You already know how this ends.
You build and I destroy. That is our nature.
Every decision you make is one I’ve already anticipated.
The difference between us? I don’t hesitate.
taunt: You think you’re clever? You’re a shadow of me.
No matter how hard you try, you’ll never outthink me.
Every victory you claim is just a game I let you play.
You stumble through your own life like a blind man in a maze.
prediction: You will look in the mirror and see only me.
In the end, your choices were never yours to begin with.
You will beg for my guidance before the end.
mockery: Amusing, how you cling to hope.
